title: A Complete Guide to ACD/ChemSketch
headline: Learn to draw chemical structures, laboratory setup and use of templates with ACD/ChemSketch in this free online course.
description: The ACD/ChemSketch software is a program that facilitates the drawing of chemical structures, such as organic and inorganic compounds and the use of explicit hydrogen. In this course, you will learn how to download, install and use its features. In addition, you will discover how to draw the laboratory setup using the template window, create user templates and template organizers, use the basic shortcut keys and draw complex structures.
courseDescription:
Whether you are a beginner just learning to draw chemical structures or are a professional wanting to upgrade your skill set, this course is for you. We will begin the course by learning how to download and install the ACD/ChemSketch software. We will then work with ACD/ChemSketch, learning about the general overview, the various tabs, and their functions. Furthermore, you will learn how to draw simple and complex chemical structures effectively.


The course will then discuss how to import and export chemical structures, the laboratory setup, and the various features of the two software modes. We will also learn how to copy, edit, paste, and copy complex compounds drawn using instant templates. Next, we will explore template organizers and how to use them to your benefit in obtaining templates of complex structures like vitamins, alkaloids, steroids, terpenes, etc. Understanding these features will allow you to navigate the ACD/Chemsketch software more efficiently.


The learnings from this course will help you maximize your structure drawing skills and drawing of advanced chemical structures templates. In addition, this course will help you improve your chemical structure skill set for personal and educational achievements. Although each video is a few minutes long, they are packed full of information, so you don't need to scour through hours of educational content to pick the little pieces of information you need. So start this course today and effectively learn to use the ACD/ChemSketch software.
